name: Google Drive
description: Store files on your Google Drive.

root.name: Root
root.description: The root of the directories under Onitu's watch

refresh_token.name: Refresh token
refresh_token.description: Token use to have authentification by Google Drive API

client_id.name: Client ID
client_id.description: API client key use to have authentification by Google Drive API

changes_timer.name: Changes Timer
changes_timer.description: Time (in seconds) between each check for changes. Set it to a lower value if you want to detect checks quicker, or to a higher value if you want to make less requests.
